about.title: About
about.subtitle: Front-End developer based in Paris, France

content.background: In 2020, I started to explore web development by myself. In 2023-2024, I consolidated my skills with OpenClassrooms' “Web Integrator” course. Prior to this reconversion, I gained diversified experience in fields such as aesthetics and tourism in Japan from 2016 to 2020.
content.portfolio: On this portfolio you can find some projects on which I have worked up to now.

pizzeria.title: Pizzeria
pizzeria.content: Pizzeria website created with React and TypeScript.

dialog.title: Pizzeria
dialog.subtitle: This site allows the pizzeria to indicate its opening hours, contact details and menu.
dialog.content: I created this site from scratch to make it easy for customers to navigate to the information that interests them. This project enabled me to consolidate my knowledge of React and TypeScript.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.content: Creation of my Portfolio website using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind.

dialog.title: Portfolio
dialog.subtitle: This site allows me to present myself and showcase some of my work.
dialog.content: My portfolio is responsive and was developed in React and by using TypeScript. I also decided to become familiar with Tailwind by using it for the first time in this project.

argentbank.title: ArgentBank
argentbank.content: Front-end implementation with React and drafting of routes to be created for the API.

dialog.title: ArgentBank [OpenClassrooms Project]
dialog.subtitle: Argent Bank is a new online bank.
dialog.content: I handled the implementation of the bank's user dashboard using React and Redux. I also used TypeScript for better code documentation. And had the opportunity to write OpenAPI documentation and specify new endpoints.

kasa.title: Kasa
kasa.content: Complete redesign of the Kasa website to transition to a React frontend stack.

dialog.title: Kasa [OpenClassrooms Project]
dialog.subtitle: Kasa is a web platform for renting apartments between individuals.
dialog.content: On this project, I was able to get started with React and reusable components. I also ensured that the site was responsive and that the integration followed the design mockup.

sophiebluel.title: Sophie Bluel's Portfolio
sophiebluel.content: Creation of a dynamic web page in JavaScript.

dialog.title: Sophie Bluel's Portfolio [OpenClassrooms Project]
dialog.subtitle: Sophie Bluel is an interior designer who showcases her work on her portfolio site.
dialog.content: I completed the mockup integration with HTML and CSS. To allow the client to update her work herself by using JavaScript.

ohmyfood.title: Ohmyfood
ohmyfood.content: Improvement of the Ohmyfood website interface with animations.

dialog.title: Ohmyfood [OpenClassrooms Project]
dialog.subtitle: Ohmyfood is a site that lists menus from gourmet restaurants and will later allow menu reservation.
dialog.content: I completed the mockup integration as well as the desired animations using SASS. This site was developed with a mobile-first approach.

booki.title: Booki
booki.content: Static integration of a mockup in HTML and CSS.

dialog.title: Booki [OpenClassrooms Project]
dialog.subtitle: Booki is a travel agency and its site allows users to find accommodations and activities in the city of their choice.
dialog.content: I handled the HTML and CSS integration of the provided mockup.

events.title: 724 Events
events.content: Debugging of the 724 Events site and writing of unit tests.

dialog.title: 724 Events [OpenClassrooms Project]
dialog.subtitle: 724 Events is an event agency with a showcase site.
dialog.content: The first developer to work on the project had to abandon it, so there were some bugs present. My role was to fix major bugs. I also fixed some minor bugs that made the user experience less enjoyable. And was able to set up unit tests and fix some on this project.

ninacarducci.title: Nina Carducci's Portfolio
ninacarducci.content: Improvement of the Lighthouse audit score and accessibility.

dialog.title: Nina Carducci's Portfolio [OpenClassrooms Project]
dialog.subtitle: Nina Carducci is a photographer who showcases her work on her portfolio site.
dialog.content: My role was to optimize the site and make it more accessible. For optimization, I made changes to the images and minified the code. And for accessibility, I made modifications to HTML semantics, color contrast, and attributes, among others. I was able to use tools like Wave or Lighthouse.
